title: HOLY SHIT!

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - once per game, during the day, publicly exclaim “HOLY SHIT, DID YOU HEAR THAT [BLANK]?”, replacing [BLANK] with a statement of your choice (ex: “HOLY SHIT, DID YOU HEAR THAT PSYCHOPATH IS THE MAYOR?!”)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- After your statement, the game alters to make your statement become true.
- If this would revive anyone or kill a player during a previous phase, the game will alter so that it’s as if it was always like that (example: “HOLY SHIT, DID YOU HEAR THAT RASEN DIED LAST NIGHT?”. The game would alter so that it’s as if Rasen had died the previous night)

desc:
Post 4216
_DUDE HOLY SHIT, DID YOU HEAR ABOUT THE PRESIDENT’S ONLYFANS?_
